about_the_game:
Telealiens is a Sokoban-type puzzle game where you mind-control boxes instead of pushing them around. You control telekinetic aliens that can push things at a distance by simply looking at them!

IN THIS DEMO...

  • 16 levels

  • 60 minutes of gameplay aprox. (depends a lot on skill)
detailed_description:
Telealiens is a Sokoban-type puzzle game where you mind-control boxes instead of pushing them around. You control telekinetic aliens that can push things at a distance by simply looking at them!

IN THIS DEMO...

  • 16 levels

  • 60 minutes of gameplay aprox. (depends a lot on skill)
name: Telealiens Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Telealiens is a puzzle game about pushing things... at a distance. You control telekinetic aliens that can move objects by simply looking at them!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Catalan*
*languages with full audio support
